channel.title: Tests on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Tests on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Code
item.description: Arrr! ☠ Pirrrates ☠ Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Some test'n fer different styles used 'n rules highlightn'n an' preformatted blocks. Inline Code This be some very long inline code. Whar' does it wrap? What about wrapp'n short inline code if multiple sections be written side by side? What about wrapp'n short inline code if multiple sections be written side/by/side?
